titleStmt.title: The case of indifferent things used in the worship of God examined, stated on the behalf of dissenters, and calmly argued Where the readers may see wherein dissenters are dissatisfied, in a reverend authors late resolutions in that case, and themselves by it, judge on whose side the truth in that matter lieth.

The case of indifferent things used in the worship of God examined, stated on the behalf of dissenters, and calmly argued Where the readers may see wherein dissenters are dissatisfied, in a reverend authors late resolutions in that case, and themselves by it, judge on whose side the truth in that matter lieth.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Joseph Collier, and the Bible, on London Bridge, next the Gate,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Williams, John. The case of indifferent things used in the worship of God.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
